docs.lead_paragraph: Lucille and Ronald Fields, both teachers in the New York City school system, couldn't find anyone who lived up to their admittedly high standards to take care of their infant son. Just before the Christmas vacation, Mr. Fields began his paternity leave to do so. He had been teaching longer than his wife and had tenure.

headline.main: Finding Someone Responsible to Care for the Children; Some Have No Choice The Adventure Fades The Male Version Where to Look for a Nursemaid Centers Limited and Restricted
